headers.title: Headers Example
headers.content:
# Main Title (H1)
## Section Title (H2)
### Subsection (H3)
#### Sub-subsection (H4)
##### Minor Heading (H5)
###### Smallest Heading (H6)

textFormatting.title: Text Formatting
textFormatting.content:
**Bold text** for emphasis
*Italic text* for subtle emphasis
***Bold and italic*** for strong emphasis
~~Strikethrough~~ for corrections
`inline code` for technical terms

lists.title: Lists
lists.content:
### Unordered List:
- First item
- Second item
  - Nested item
  - Another nested item
- Third item

### Ordered List:
1. First step
2. Second step
   1. Sub-step A
   2. Sub-step B
3. Third step

mixed.title: Mixed Content Example
mixed.content:
# Hendra's Technical Stack

## Backend Development

Hendra specializes in **microservices architecture** using:

- **Go/Golang**: Primary language for high-performance services
- **Python**: For AI/ML applications and data processing
- **Ruby on Rails**: For rapid web application development

### Code Example:
```go
// Microservice health check endpoint
func healthCheck(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
    response := map[string]string{
        "status": "healthy",
        "timestamp": time.Now().Format(time.RFC3339),
    }
    json.NewEncoder(w).Encode(response)
}
```

## AI & Data Engineering

> "Data is the new oil, but AI is the refinery."

### Technologies:

| Tool | Purpose | Experience |
|------|---------|------------|
| TensorFlow | Deep Learning | 2+ years |
| BigQuery | Data Warehousing | 3+ years |
| dbt | Data Transformation | 2+ years |

### Recent Projects:
1. **AI Agent Chatbot** - LLM RAG system
2. **Data Pipeline Optimization** - BigQuery & Dataflow
3. **Computer Vision Models** - TensorFlow & Keras

---

**Want to know more?** Feel free to ask about any specific technology or project! ðŸš€
